location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: Photograph of a group portrait taken on board HMS Norfolk, 11 January 1948, on visit to Bahrain by Commander-in-Chief, East Indies Station, Vice Admiral Sir Arthur Francis Eric Palliser, receiving the call of His Highness Shaikh Sir Salman bin Hamad al Khalifah [Shaikh Salmān bin Ḥamad Āl Khalīfah]. Also shown are Shaikh Mohamed bin Isa [Shaikh Muḥammad bin ‘Īsá Āl Khalīfah], Shaikh Abdulla bin Isa [Shaikh ‘Abdullāh bin ‘Īsá Āl Khalīfah], Shaikh Mubarak bin Hamad [Shaikh Muḥammad bin ‘Īsá Āl Khalīfah], Shaikh Daij bin Hamad [Shaikh Da'īj bin Ḥamad Āl Khalīfah], Shaikh Khalifah bin Mohamed, Shaikh Ebrahim bin Mohamed, Shaikh Hamad bin Abdulla, Shaikh Rashid bin Khalifah, Shaikh Rashid bin Abdulla[Shaikh Muḥammad bin ‘Īsá Āl Khalīfah] , Shaikh Abdulla bin Isa [Shaikh ‘Abdullāh bin ‘Īsá Āl Khalīfah], Shaikh Mubarak bin Hamad [Shaikh Mubārak bin Ḥamad Āl Khalīfah], Shaikh Daij bin Hamad [Shaikh Da'īj bin Ḥamad Āl Khalīfah], Shaikh Khalifah bin Mohamed [Shaikh Khalīfah bin Muḥammad Āl Khalīfah], Shaikh Ebrahim bin Mohamed [Shaikh Ibrāhīm bin Muḥammad Āl Khalīfah], Shaikh Hamad bin Abdulla [Shaikh Ḥamad bin ‘Abdullāh Āl Khalīfah], Shaikh Rashid bin Khalifah [Shaikh Rāshid bin Khalīfah Āl Khalīfah], Shaikh Rashid bin Abdulla [Shaikh Rāshid bin ‘Abdullāh Āl Khalīfah and Shaikh Isa bin Salman [Shaikh ‘Īsá bin Salmān Āl Khalīfah]. Also shown are other naval officers as well as Charles Dalrymple Belgrave, Adviser to the Government of Bahrain.
